cqs.cq: What is the definition of "good jobs" and how will that be measured?

How will the national minimum wage be raised and what will be the impact on inflation?

What does "law and order" mean to you?"
Is a city with investments of yours a good enough reason to claim you love it?"
Why does having endorsements from police groups make you more qualified to be president?"
